TopicTitle: How to hide a picture and description?

Articles.Content: Those pull down bars... Where you can hide pieces of your post so it doesn't take up all the space at once... How do you do that?

Those would be spoilers, the BBcode for them is [noparse]

image or text here

[/noparse]

That gives you this:

image or text here

Exaples for all BBcode are available here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/misc.php?do=bbcode
